Mitch Daniels has said he won't make a decision about running for president until after this year's legislative season ends in April. If( Mitch Daniels ) runs, I think it's hard for Mike Pence , because all the financial base in Indiana would likely go to Mitch Daniels , Charlie Black said. There have been marked improvements in pass rates over the past decade and what you've got is a Michael Government wanting to get the measure way down at a lower level so they can show some sort of improvement. National figures show just 15.6 per cent of pupils met the Baccalaureate threshold last summer.
